title: Richenhagen on Equipment Industry (Audio)
itunes:title: Richenhagen on Equipment Industry (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. \u0010(Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Martin H Richenhagen\u0010Chairman/President/CEO\u0010Agco Corp\u0010Will discuss the ag equipment industry, commodity prices, doing business in Africa, as well as the potential impact of President Trump's infrastructure plan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
